casebody.data:
2001-3047 (La. 10/14/02)

STATE ex rel. Peter MERCADEL v. STATE of Louisiana. No. 2001-KH-3047. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 14, 2002.

In re Mercadel, Peter; — Plaintiff; Applying for Supervisory and/or Remedial Writs, Parish of Orleans, Criminal District Court Div. G, No. 252-940.

Denied.
